dynamic.isNotEmpty: ( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_name is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_name) < 1 or $csscNameNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_name = #csscName#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_mobile is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_mobile) < 1 or $csscMobileNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_mobile = #csscMobile#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_car_number is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_car_number) < 1 or $csscCarNumberNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_car_number like #csscCarNumber#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_name is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_name) < 1 or $csscDriverNameNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_name = #csscDriverName#)

( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_image is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_image) < 1 or $csscDriverImageNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_image = #csscDriverImage#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_color is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_color) < 1 or $csscDriverColorNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_driver_color = #csscDriverColor#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_msg is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_msg) < 1 or $csscMsgNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_msg like #csscMsg#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_point is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_point) < 1 or $csscStartPointNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_point = #csscStartPoint#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_addr is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_addr) < 1 or $csscStartAddrNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_start_addr like #csscStartAddr#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_point is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_point) < 1 or $csscFinishPointNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_point = #csscFinishPoint#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_addr is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_addr) < 1 or $csscFinishAddrNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_finish_addr like #csscFinishAddr#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_assess is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_assess) < 1 or $csscAssessNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_assess like #csscAssess#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_third_no is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_third_no) < 1 or $csscThirdNoNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_third_no = #csscThirdNo#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_response is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_response) < 1 or $csscResponseNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_response like #csscResponse#)
( cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_demand is null or length(cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_demand) < 1 or $csscDemandNot$ cs_special_car$suffix$.cssc_demand = #csscDemand#)
